mapper.select: select bno,title,content,regdate,updatedate from ( select /*+INDEX_DESC(tbl_notice pk_notice) */ rownum rn, bno, title, content, regdate, updatedate from tbl_notice where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum}-1)*#{amount}
mapper.insert:
select seq_notice.nextval from dual
insert into tbl_notice(bno,title,content) values (#{bno},#{title},#{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, updatedate=sysdate where bno = #{bno}
